edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App3

Class FragmentForecast

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App3.FragmentForecast

  • public class FragmentForecast
extends Fragment
    The fragment that displays the forecast.

    Description:
    This class controls the display of the forecast. It creates the fragment, inflates the view, and then it updates the view with the proper information.

    Since:
    November 10, 2013
    Author:
    James Tillma and Teresa Worner
